backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product, collection, and contact types with in‑memory maps and initialization plus query methods for fetching collections and filtered products.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs tied to visual‑theme updates and new static asset integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short summaries describing each component, hook, page, and style configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode variants for the site’s aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration wiring all pages and initializing the backend actor on load.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartProvide: Wrapper component that simply renders children while serving as cart provider placeholder.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorSt: Reusable error UI with icon, message display, and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Loading indicator component showing a spinning icon and status message.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Contact form with validation, submission via mutation hook, and success/error handling states.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: App layout with background texture, header nav, main content wrapper, and branded footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/HeaderNav.ts: Responsive header navigation with links, branding, a cart button showing item count, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/theme/TextureBac: Renders a fixed repeating grunge texture background layer with low opacity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store persisting cart items with helpers for modifying quantities and calculating totals.
Mutation hook that submits contact messages through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state and loading identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching collections, product lists, and individual products from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom light/dark theme variables, fonts, and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/imagePaths.ts: Maps product image keys to asset paths with helpers to resolve single or multiple images.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing the brand mission with styled sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item listing, quantity controls, subtotal, and empty-cart fallback.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact info, business hours, and a contact form for sending messages.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage hero section, feature highlights, and brand messaging with links to shop and about pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays product details with images, tags, quantity controls, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Loads collections and products, allowing filtering by collection and linking to individual product pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state, including theme goals, image requirements, and a list of implemented features for a stylized clothing website. Contains metadata, versioning, and existing functionality descriptions.
